WorkItem.Description:
I have performed the Suggested Fix and continue to receive this error. If I am posting this message without having performed the Suggested Fix I am aware that I am consuming the Developer(s) time in managing my Issue unnecessarily.

== These are the Steps that I have tried ==
Opened the pop-up for meta-gem choices for a head-piece and attempted to refresh one of the items (a meta gem) from Wowhead.
WorkItem.Summary: Refreshing Item from Wowhead in head-slot metagem pop-up throws Arg_NullReferenceException

Comments.Message: can you tell us what item you were trying to refresh?

Item: Destructive Shadowspirit Diamond (ItemID:52298)

TalentSpec=Fire
Tradeskills=Tailoring/Enchanting
